metadata.title: CVE-2013-1831 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: lib/setuplib.php in Moodle through 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.8, 2.3.x before2.3.5, and 2.4.x before 2.4.2 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via an invalid request, which reveals the absolute path in anexception message.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
